segments.text: You're supposed to stand here quietly until the flag - raising ceremony is over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About what time can I go to my own class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that it is all over . can I go now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet . You should stand still for another few minutes . Late-comers must be recorded .
segments.speaker: S2
